The language used is unprofessional and outdated, discouraging certain groups from applying. The requirement for a driver's licence and the note about personal appearance and traditional values are examples of this bias.
text:
Company: Johnston, Bernard and Powers

Job Type: Investigative Consultant

About Us:
Johnston, Bernard and Powers is a prestigious consultancy firm dedicated to delivering high-quality investigative services to our esteemed clients.

Job Description:
We are seeking a highly skilled Investigative Consultant to join our team. As an Investigative Consultant, you will be responsible for conducting thorough investigations, gathering evidence, and providing expert analysis to support our clients' cases.

Responsibilities:

 Conduct thorough investigations, including interviews, research, and evidence collection
 Analyze and interpret complex data to identify key findings and trends
 Develop comprehensive reports and presentations to communicate results to clients
 Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure seamless delivery of services

Qualifications and Experience:

 5+ years of experience in investigative services or a related field
 Bachelor's degree in a relevant field (e.g., criminology, law, or social sciences)
 Proven track record of delivering high-quality results under tight deadlines
 Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
 Ability to work independently and as part of a team
 Possession of a driver's licence is required for all roles (must be willing to travel for investigations)

Perks and Benefits:
We are committed to fair and equitable pay practices. The salary for this position ranges from $80,000 to $110,000 USD, based on your experience and skills. You will also receive a comprehensive benefits package, including medical, dental, and vision insurance, as well as a 401(k) matching program.

Note: We are an organisation that values traditional values and prefers candidates who share our outlook. Please ensure that your personal appearance aligns with our company's professional image.
